title: Chocolate oat sunflower cookies
directions: Line half-sheet pan with nonstick baking mat or parchement
In large saucepan over medium heat
Cook, stirring untill they are a shade darker ( 1-2 minutes)
Stir untill sugar has almost dissolved
Using 1/2 tsp measure scoop batter into prepared pan spacing scoops 2 inches apart. As it bakes the batter will spread into flat, lacy 2-3 inch disks.
Drizzle cooled cookies with melted chocolate
